== Kalady (CT) (627971) ==

Kalady (CT) is a town in the [[Aluva]] taluka of [[Ernakulam]] district with an area of 10.32 sq. km. and harbouring 5139 households with total population of 20380 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kakkanad]] is at a distance of 35 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 240 km. Male population is 10086 and female population is 10294. Scheduled Caste population is 1047 and Scheduled Tribes population is 18. Census Location Code of the town is 627971<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 30 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 30 km. Railway station is at Angamaly at a distance of 10 km.
